{{Wireless embedded system |brand=NetComm |model=NB6 |revision=Plus4Wn |asin= |est_release_date=10/2011 |fcc_date= |availability=now |is_manuf=No |manuf=Askey |type=wireless router, dsl modem |fcc_id=XIA-N |pcb_id=41-000580 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM6358 |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Spansion |fla1_model=S29GL032N90TFI04 |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=H5DU2562GTR-E3C |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 (unpopulated) |expansion_usb_num=<!-- J7 --> |jtag=yes,, 14-pin header,, J2,, |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, J3,, |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM4322L |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Broadcom |sw_model=BCM5325E |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports= |addl_chips=2.4GHz RF Power Amplifier IC;SiGe;SE2528L;;2; ,,, ADSL Line Driver;Broadcom;BCM6301KSG;;1; |flags=ADSL2+ |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=00:60:64 |oui_eth=00:60:64 }} {{TagLine|ADSL2+ 11n Wireless Router}} :Models: NB6, NB6W, NB6Plus4, NB6Plus4W, NB6Plus4Wn
*[https://www.insidegadgets.com/2018/02/05/inside-the-netcomm-nb6plus4wn-adsl2-wifi-router-dated-2011/ ''NetComm NB6Plus4Wn'' Teardown on '''InsideGadgets'''] :CPU: [[Broadcom]] BCM6358 @240MHz (BMIPS3300) :Flash: ''Spansion'' S29GL032N90TFI04 (4MB NAND) :RAM: ''Hynix'' H5DU2562GTR-E3C (32MB SDRAM)
